itinerary.mapNote: Cashapampa trailhead entry. Santa Cruz valley. 3750m.
After Punta Unión Pass 4750m. East side descent. 3850m.
Trail end. Bus connection to Huaraz. 3700m.

waypoints.name: Punta Unión Pass
waypoints.note: Trek highpoint. Best views of Artesonraju and Santa Cruz peaks.

waypoints.name: Artesonraju
waypoints.note: The Paramount Pictures logo mountain. Reflects in Laguna 69 below.

waypoints.name: Alpamayo
waypoints.note: Voted 'world's most beautiful mountain'. North face ice flute.

waypoints.name: Laguna Taullipampa
waypoints.note: Camp 2 lake. Artesonraju and Santa Cruz Grande reflection.

waypoints.name: Cashapampa Trailhead
waypoints.note: Northern trailhead. Donkey hire. Santa Cruz circuit start.
